name: Veggie Voyager
description:

Story

After your ship 🛸 crashed on Earth, the passenger who was with you is now paralyzed and you are their only hope for survival.

You will soon come to realize that your new "friend" is not exactly the ideal companion in these dire circumstances.

Will you show mercy and spare them?

Fullscreen

For the best gameplay experience, it is recommended to set the game to fullscreen by scrolling to the bottom right corner of the screen and clicking the fullscreen icon using the scroll bars.

Controls
  • Movement: WASD
  • Orientation: Mouse
  • Grab with Left Hand: Left Mouse Button
  • Grab with Right Hand: Right Mouse Button
  • Grab Orientation: Mouse
  • Jump: Space Bar
Game Mechanics

The Physics Ragdoll Characters in this game are an entertaining feature, and the player has the ability to interact with various objects like vegetables, elevators, shop items and more! 

The game also includes roguelike elements, like a shop where the player can purchase upgrades and items.

Opening Doors 🚪🚪 Harvesting Veggies 🥕🍅🍅 Funny Physics 🤡

 

Elevators and Carts 🛒 Challenges For YOU

1. Try to speedrun the game by buying the gun and bringing it to your companion.

2. If anyone is able to reach the top of this tower, I will be thoroughly impressed and will have the utmost respect for your accomplishment. Please share a video or picture of your success with me!

The Future of This Project

At this time, I do not have plans to continue development on this project. However, I have recorded footage of the game jam and will be releasing a video on my Youtube Channel soon . If there is sufficient demand for more content, I may consider adding additional features and levels in the future.

Support

Hello, my name is juzdepeche (Justin) and I am an indie game developer who also enjoys creating videos on YouTube. If you would like to support me, please consider subscribing to my YouTube channel at the following link, your support would be greatly appreciated.
